name: intgr-service.yml
configuration:
spring:
  datasource:
    driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
    url: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres-anton/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-intgr-service"
    username: "postgres"
    password: "1"
  profiles:
    active: develop
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-service
  jpa:
    database: postgresql
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect
    properties:
      hibernate:
        enable_lazy_load_no_trans: true
        connection:
          release_mode: after_transaction
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  jmx:
    enabled: false
  rabbitmq:
    host: rabbitmq-anton
    username: admin
    password: admin
    listener:
      simple:
        acknowledge-mode: none
    autoCloseQueue:
      queueCamundaCreateTaskByTtms: camunda_auto_close_task_ttms
    integration:
      eip:
        ttms:
          createIncoming: eip_ttms_create_incoming
          createOutcoming: eip_ttms_create_outcoming
          closeIncoming: eip_ttms_close_incoming
          closeOutcoming: eip_ttms_close_outcoming
        sberbank:
          createIncoming: eip_sberbank_create_incoming
          createOutcoming: eip_sberbank_create_outcoming
          doneIncoming: eip_sberbank_done_incoming
          doneOutcoming: eip_sberbank_done_outcoming
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://nttm-auth-jwt-6784:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
  integration:
    ttms:
      camundaMessageName: "o2o_sub_event"
      defaultAddress: "Москва"
      closeCodeName: "Закрыт внешней системой (O2O)"
server:
  port: 8095
  servlet:
    context-path: /nttm-intgr-service
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: configs/log4j2.yml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: trace
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
nttm:
  suspendTime: 172800000
  sleepSeconds: 5
  backOffPeriod: 2000
  maxRetry: 6
  update:
    corePoolSize: 4
    maxPoolSize: 10
    keepAliveSeconds: 600
    queueCapacity: 100
  prefix: "http://nttm.6784.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io"
  auth:
    sourceSystem:
      15:
        username: "nttm_intgr_tt_sberbank"
        password: "123456"
      16:
        username: "nttm_intgr_ttms"
        password: "GdPKTAmsDVr4i6M"
  default: #for TT Sberbank EIP system
    sourceSystemName: "TT Sberbank"
    ticketSubtypeId: 3
    ticketTypeID: 13
    pointInterfaceId: 2
    speedMeasureId: 2
    channelTypeId: 1
    declarant: "Заявитель"
    executor: "Оператор внешней системы"
    addressFormat: 1
